    Class EventPump

    The event "pump" class listens to all events from Curses, processes them and passes them along to consumers.

    Inheritance
    object
    EventPump
    Implements
    IEventPump
    Inherited Members

    object.Equals(object, object)

    Assembly: sharpie.dll
    Syntax
    [PublicAPI]
public sealed class EventPump : IEventPump

    Listen()

    Gets an enumerable that is used to get enumerate events from Curses as they are generated.

    Declaration
    public IEnumerable<Event> Listen()
    Returns
    Type Description
    IEnumerable<Event>

    The event listening enumerable.
    Remarks

    This operation is not thread safe.

    Exceptions
    Type Condition
    CursesSynchronizationException

    Thrown if this operation was expected to run on the main thread/context but wasn't.
    CursesOperationException

    A Curses error occured.

    Uses(ResolveEscapeSequenceFunc)

    Checks if the screen has a given key sequence resolver registered.

    Declaration
    public bool Uses(ResolveEscapeSequenceFunc resolver)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    ResolveEscapeSequenceFunc resolver

    The resolver to check.
    Returns
    Type Description
    bool

    true if the resolver is registered; false otherwise.
    Remarks

    This operation is not thread safe.

    Exceptions
    Type Condition
    ArgumentNullException

    Thrown is resolver is null.
    CursesSynchronizationException

    Thrown if this operation was expected to run on the main thread/context but wasn't.
